question: Commonest neurological tumour associated with NF-2:-
exp: NF is a type of genetic condition Gene Chromosome Protein Features NF 1 17 Neurofibromin - Cafe-au-lait-macules (CALM) NF 2 22 Merlin -Vestibular Schwannoma (Acoustic neuroma): commonest neurological tumour. -Giant Neurofibromas, Meningioma - Axillary Freckling
